# Building local experiences with room tracking

**Sample Code**

Use room tracking in visionOS to provide custom interactions with physical spaces.

## Overview



### Configure the sample code project

Because this sample uses [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit], you can only run this sample on a device, not in Simulator. This sample can run on the following:

- An Apple Vision Pro with visionOS 2 or later
title: Building local experiences with room tracking
